DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyse large CPR database , German Resuscitation Registry , evaluate potential benefit mechanical CPR device manual CPR adult cardiac arrest victim . The primary endpoint consider ROSC .
DOC.brief_title: Application Mechanical Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation Devices Their Value Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest : A Retrospective Analysis German Resuscitation Registry
DOC.detailed_description: In retrospective analysis German Resuscitation Registry 2007-2014 , investigator examine outcome use mechanical CPR return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) adults out-of-hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) . Investigators compare mechanical CPR ( Intervention group ) manual CPR ( control group ) . According preclinical risk factor , investigator calculate predict ROSC-after-cardiac-arrest ( RACA ) score group , compare rate ROSC observe . Using multivariate analysis , investigator adjust influence device ' application ROSC epidemiological factor therapeutic measure .
DOC.criteria: hospital cardiac arrest time prod January 2007 December 2014 CPR attempt Investigators exclude case CPR continue less five minute , duration CPR missing , outcome early period affect CPR mode . Children age less 18 year patient unknown age also exclude device approve resuscitation child . An active compressiondecompression ( ACD ) handheld suction device , compress actively decompress chest compression . Investigators also exclude case ACD CPR use , constitute different technology . Cases due trauma exclude application mechanical CPR device may limit due traumatic event . Cases data ROSC and/or CPR mode miss also exclude .
